findings.description: Blueprint declares outbound interface 'study_reflect' (POST /study/reflect) but the call at line 142 uses '/study/start' instead. The endpoint still exists and works, but the contract name diverges from the blueprint.
findings.suggestion: Update either the blueprint interface ID or the endpoint path to match. Prefer updating the blueprint since the code is functional.

findings.description: Logger named 'GAIA.Core' but module convention is 'GAIA.AgentCore' (service.module pattern). Other modules in this package follow the convention correctly.
Semantic probe failure caught and logged, falls back to empty context. This is correct graceful degradation — noting for completeness.

summary: Agent core implementation is structurally sound with correct graceful degradation patterns. Two minor contract/naming drifts noted — the study endpoint path diverges from blueprint declaration, and one logger doesn't follow the hierarchical naming convention. Neither impacts functionality. Divergence score 0.15 reflects minor naming drift, not architectural issues.
